content:
That's great to hear! It sounds like you're excited to get back out on the road with your new bike. Cleaning your bike regularly is important to keep it running smoothly and to prolong its lifespan.

It's also awesome that you were able to break it in last weekend. The first few rides on a new bike can be a bit nerve-wracking, but it sounds like you're feeling more comfortable now. What kind of route are you thinking of taking for your next ride? Are you looking for a leisurely cruise or a more challenging ride with some hills or long distances?
